title_teim: The seventh annual induction ceremony. 1992. Awards Reel #11 1/16/92
title_ssm: The seventh annual induction ceremony. 1992. Awards Reel #11 1/16/92
title_si: The seventh annual induction ceremony. 1992. Awards Reel #11 1/16/92
summary_teim: The 1992 Rock Hall induction of Elmore James, Professor Longhair, Leo Fender and Dos Pomus. The unedited reel is from the stage left camera.
summary_ssm: The 1992 Rock Hall induction of Elmore James, Professor Longhair, Leo Fender and Dos Pomus. The unedited reel is from the stage left camera.
contents_teim: Paul Shaffer and the World’s Most Dangerous Band perform -- Unidentified male gives opening remarks -- Jon Landau gives introductory remarks -- Seymour Stein gives remarks -- Janne Wenner speaks about Elmore James -- Robbie Robertson inducts James -- Bobby Robertson accepts award for James -- Ahmet Ertegun speaks about Professor Longhair -- Aaron Neville inducts Longhair -- Alex Bird accepts award Longhair -- Keith Richards inducts Leo Fender --  Phyllis Fender accepts award -- Phil Spector introduces Paul Shaffer and the World’s Most Dangerous Band -- Spector inducts Doc Pomus.
contents_ssm: Paul Shaffer and the World’s Most Dangerous Band perform -- Unidentified male gives opening remarks -- Jon Landau gives introductory remarks -- Seymour Stein gives remarks -- Janne Wenner speaks about Elmore James -- Robbie Robertson inducts James -- Bobby Robertson accepts award for James -- Ahmet Ertegun speaks about Professor Longhair -- Aaron Neville inducts Longhair -- Alex Bird accepts award Longhair -- Keith Richards inducts Leo Fender --  Phyllis Fender accepts award -- Phil Spector introduces Paul Shaffer and the World’s Most Dangerous Band -- Spector inducts Doc Pomus.
series_teim: Annual induction ceremony (Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation)
series_ssm: Annual induction ceremony (Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation)
series_sim: Annual induction ceremony (Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation)
collection_teim: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation Records
collection_ssm: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation Records
collection_sim: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation Records
collection_authority_ssm: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
archival_series_authority_ssm: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
abstract_ssm: At 1992 Induction Ceremony -- Opening Medley: Big Chief, Dust My Broom, Save the Last Dance for Me, Green Onions, Turn on Your Love Light, Ring of Fire, It's Your Thing, Over Under Sideways Down, All Along the Watchtower, Hold On (Paul Shaffer and the World’s Most Dangerous Band) -- Bob Krasnow gives opening remarks -- Jon Landau gives introductory remarks -- Seymour Stein gives remarks -- Jann Wenner speaks about Elmore James -- Video montage of Elmore James -- Robbie Robertson inducts Elmore James -- Bobby Robertson accepts award on behalf of Elmore James -- Ahmet Ertegun speaks about Professor Longhair -- Video montage of Professor Longhair -- Aaron Neville inducts Longhair -- Alex Bird (Son of Professor Longhair) accepts award on behalf of Longhair -- Keith Richards inducts Leo Fender -- Phyllis Fender (wife of Leo Fender) accepts award award on behalf of Leo -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Doc Pomus -- Video montage of Doc Pomus -- Phil Spector inducts Doc Pomus
